author: dashorst
msg: Added example for markup inheritance, fixes 1424558

author: ehillenius
msg: Introduced SessionFacade to get around the problem that we want to do *some* things - ie getting the session id and storing the session object -
directly on the HttpSession instead of via the ISessionStore instance. The problem that Johan found, and for which this is a solution is that
the store itself was stored in the httpsession due to the circularity it worked. With this code, Session can be stored in the actual HttpSession
just fine - but any additional attributes will be done via the session store - while SessionStore is kept with the application instance and thus
not stored directly in the session.
